projects.name: ShApp4Points
projects.description: An analytics app whose purpose is to collect user shopping behavior pattern information; users register and use the app to enter their purchase trip. With the information gathered, they can send certain surveys and usage questionnaires for reward points to be used for GCs, household appliances, and more. Our main task is to develop the designed modules and features as well as full customization of the app including local storage of data using Core Data.

projects.name: GiftIt
projects.description: A social mobile application that enables users to launch personalized gift campaigns to fund any gift items from merchant shops or charity causes from foundation partners. Our main task is to develop the designed modules and features as well as full customization of the app.
